sentences.en: Except the method of nature electric field, we used DB-3 popular dam seepage detection device of flow field method to reconnoiter around Jiangya dam site.
sentences.cn: 在对江垭水库大坝物探勘查工作中，除运用了自然电场法等常规查漏方法外，还采用了流场法DB-3普及型堤坝渗漏检测仪进行勘查。

sentences.en: Google Earth has given scientists a way to scout terrain and cheaply reconnoiter habitats likely to produce new finds.
sentences.cn: 谷歌地球（Google Earth）使科学家能够廉价地侦察地形，探索那些有可能出现新物种的栖息地。

sentences.en: His intention had been to reconnoiter.
I thought it was dangerous, but he insisted and went on ahead to reconnoiter.
sentences.cn: 我认为那太危险了, 但他却坚持要去探探路.

sentences.en: It'seems wise to reconnoiter before entering the town.
sentences.cn: 在进入那城以前,先侦察一下是明智的.

sentences.en: Li Mingchao Coal seam gas and its reconnoiter and exploitation. Beijing: Geology Publishing House, 1996.
sentences.cn: 李明潮,梁生正,赵克镜.煤层气及其勘探开发[M]. 北京: 地质出版社, 1996.

sentences.en: Malicious users can use this information to reconnoiter the naming schema in your organization and attack key infrastructure services.
sentences.cn: 恶意用户可以使用这个信息来侦察您的组织机构的名计划，并攻击关键基本设施服务。

sentences.en: These days, I am attentive reconnoiter, to capture the sound that interferes old Mom toasleep.
sentences.cn: 这些天, 我细心侦察, 想抓住干扰老妈入睡的声音.
